TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebActionable

summary.span: 讓 控制項或其他伺服器控制項能夠容納動詞命令 (Verb) 集合。

span.span: Enables controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的動詞控制項是使用者可以在使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作。A verb in controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI). 一般而言，動詞命令會在 UI 來表示可點按的控制項，例如按鈕、 連結或功能表項目。Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item. Web 組件控制項集合提供標準動詞命令預設會將所提供之控制項和其他伺服器控制項 （例如自訂 ASP.NET 和使用者控制項），可以像是控制項置於區域。The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like controls when placed in zones. 標準動詞命令包括關閉、 最小化、 還原、 刪除、 編輯和匯出。Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export. 您也可以建立搭配使用的自訂動詞命令和伺服器控制項。You can also create custom verbs for use with and server controls. 介面，以其屬性，可讓您整合您的控制項的自訂動詞命令的方式。The interface, with its property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls. 類別會實作介面，並實作其單一內容。The class implements the interface and implements its single property. 若要加入自訂動詞命令，此控制項的繼承自類別，您必須覆寫屬性，將自訂動詞命令加入至集合，並傳回集合。To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the class, you must override the property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection. 所參考的集合屬性包含僅自訂動詞命令，則為標準動詞命令不會包含在這個集合。The collection referenced by the property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection. 預設的傳回值屬性控制項是`null`，因為根據預設沒有任何自訂動詞命令集合中。The default return value of the property in a control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection. 加入伺服器控制項所沒有的自訂動詞命令控制項需要一個額外的步驟。Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not controls requires one extra step. 在這些情況下，控制項也必須實作介面，並實作屬性。In those cases, the controls must also implement the interface and implement the property. 加入自訂動詞之後集合，自動設定這個 Web 組件控制項負責建立及呈現的自訂動詞命令所需的其他步驟。After you have added custom verbs to the collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範 介面的簡單實作。The following code example demonstrates a simple implementation of the interface. 程式碼範例的第一個部分會顯示使用者控制項中實作之介面的方式。The first part of the code example shows how the interface is implemented in a user control. 使用者控制項實作藉由建立兩個自訂動詞命令，並定義當使用者按一下其中一個動詞命令時所呼叫方法的屬性。The user control implements the property by creating two custom verbs and defining a method that is called when a user clicks either of the verbs. 為了簡單起見，相同的方法適用於這兩個動詞命令。For simplicity, the same method is used for both verbs. 方法會更新名為屬性的值`VerbCounterClicks`。The method updates the value of a property named `VerbCounterClicks`. 程式碼`Page_Load`方法存取控制項顯示集合中的自訂動詞命令的總計數的屬性。The code for the `Page_Load` method accesses the property of the control to display the total count of custom verbs in the collection. 這個計數不包括標準的 Web 組件動詞命令。This count does not include the standard Web Parts verbs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是.aspx 網頁裝載使用者控制項。The second part of the code example is an .aspx page that hosts the user control. 因為控制項參考控制項，在 ASP.NET 包裝中的使用者控制項的執行階段控制，並將它視為控制項。Because the control is referenced in a control, at run time ASP.NET wraps the user control in a control and treats it as a control. 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請注意底部的控制項的標籤會顯示所參考的集合中的多少的自訂動詞命令是屬性。After you load the page in a browser, notice that the label at the bottom of the control displays how many custom verbs are in the collection referenced by the property. 也請注意，是否您按一下控制項中的動詞命令功能表，然後按一下其中一個指令動詞，另一個標籤會出現顯示的自訂動詞命令已被點選總次數。Also note that if you click the verbs menu in the control, and click either of the verbs, another label appears showing the total number of times the custom verbs have been clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbhostcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbhostvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得自訂 物件集合的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of custom objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性集合的自訂動詞命令 （如果有的話） 的參考加入至動詞命令功能表中的標頭或其他伺服器控制項。The property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a or other server control. 集合未包含標準參考物件提供的 Web 組件控制項的設定，例如， ， ， ，或。The collection does not contain references to the standard objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as , , , , or . 開發人員想要加入自訂動詞命令，以自訂控制項衍生自類別只可以覆寫屬性，類別會實作。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the class can simply override the property that the class implements. 開發人員想要加入使用者控制項或不是自訂控制項的自訂動詞命令控制項，必須實作介面所提供的實作屬性。Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a control, must implement the interface by providing an implementation of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用使用者控制項中實作的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property as implemented in a user control. 這個程式碼範例的完整程式碼可以在的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀主題。The full code for this code example can be found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列的部分程式碼範例示範的自訂實作使用者控制項中的屬性。The following portion of the code example demonstrates a custom implementation of the property within a user control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/CS/usercontrolverbcs.ascx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebActionable_Overview/VB/usercontrolverbvb.ascx#3)]
